title: Director, Product Marketing, Ad Platforms
summary: Apple is a place where extraordinary people come to do their best work. Every day, we work to create products that enrich people’s lives. For the Ad Platforms group, this means delivering ads in a way that helps people around the world discover content, supports brands, and protects and respects everyone’s privacy. Join us and become a part of a team driven by values that put consumers first while helping businesses grow!
description: Apple’s Ad Platforms group is looking for a Product Marketing Lead. This role will be responsible for defining and positioning our advertising products, globally. This leader will understand and appreciate how Apple’s advertising solutions are different and will be energized by the challenges and opportunity to create a more thoughtful advertising landscape. This person will inspire teams, clients, and partners and effectively deliver products, stories, and customer success to the market. Working closely with product, sales, data insights, and other marketing functions, this leader will substantially contribute to the success of our clients who advertise on our platform.
preferred_qualifications: Appreciates Apple culture and values, and is energized by the challenges of redefining and demonstrating the benefits of user-centric advertising products. Creative problem solver, adept at translating business opportunities into effective GTM strategies. Relentless attention to detail, thoughtfulness, and curiosity are required. 15+ years experience developing B2B marketing strategies, content, and programs. BA/BS or above in Communications, Marketing, Advertising, Business, or related field
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay is one part of our total compensation package and is determined within a range. The base pay range for this role is between $255,400 and $408,200, and your base pay will depend on your skills, qualifications, experience, and location. Apple employees also have the opportunity to become an Apple shareholder through participation in Apple’s discretionary employee stock programs. Apple employees are eligible for discretionary restricted stock unit awards, and can purchase Apple stock at a discount if voluntarily participating in Apple’s Employee Stock Purchase Plan. Comprehensive medical and dental coverage, retirement benefits, range of discounted products and free services, and for formal education related to advancing your career at Apple, reimbursement for certain educational expenses — including tuition. Additionally, this role might be eligible for discretionary bonuses or commission payments as well as relocation.
